MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY21 area of Welshpool, affecting properties in Forden and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.39PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We now expect the power to be restored by 9.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.39PM on 10th March 2021.
